subSections.title: Readings
Compounds
subSections.text:
{{der-top|Compounds}}
* {{ja-r|篝%火%草|かがり%び%そう}}: [[cyclamen]]
* {{ja-r|鹿の子%草|かのこ%そう}}: [[valerian]]
* {{ja-r|甘草|かんぞう}}: [[licorice]]
* {{ja-r|吉草|きっそう}}: [[valerian]]
* {{ja-r|駒%草|コマ%クサ}}: {{taxlink|Dicentra peregrina|species}}
* {{ja-r|纈草|けっそう}}: [[valerian]]
* {{ja-r|香草|こうそう}}: [[fragrant]] [[herb]]
* {{ja-r|嫩草|どんそう}}: [[young]] [[grass]]
* {{ja-r|波布草|はぶそう}}: [[coffee senna]]
* {{ja-r|菠薐草|ほうれんそう}}: [[spinach]]
* {{ja-r|薬草|やくそう}}: [[medicinal]] [[herb]] or [[plant]]s
* {{ja-r|鎧%草|よろい%ぐさ}}: ''[[Angelica dahurica]]''
{{der-mid}}
* {{ja-r|緑%草|りょく%そう}}: [[lush]] green [[grass]]
* {{ja-r|霊草|れいそう}}: [[mysterious]] or [[mystical]] [[herb]] or [[plant]]s
* {{ja-r|草書|そうしょ}}: grass [[script]] (cursive writing)
* {{ja-r|草%冠|くさ%かんむり}}: "grass crown"
* {{ja-r|草%木|くさ%き}}: grass(es) and [[tree]]s - [[plant]]s
* {{ja-r|穀草|こくそう}}: cereal, rice grasses
* {{ja-r|草原|そうげん}}: [[grassland]], [[meadow]]
* {{ja-r|草%薙の剣|^くさ%なき の ^つるぎ}}: Kusanagi no Tsurugi
* {{ja-r|七%草の節句|なな%くさ の せっく}}: the [[festival]] of [[seven]] [[herb]]s
* {{ja-r|豚%草|ぶた%くさ}}: [[common ragweed]]
* {{ja-r|ぺんぺん草|ぺんぺんぐさ}}: [[shepherd's purse]]
{{der-bottom}}

subSections.title: Etymology 1
Noun
Prefix
Noun
subSections.text:
{{ja-noun|そう|hhira=さう}}

# [[grass]]
# a [[draft]], a [[rough]] [[copy]]
# [[cursive]], [[calligraphy]] in a [[running]] [[hand]]
# something [[unofficial]], an [[informal]] [[abbreviation]] or [[knock-off]]

subSections.title: Synonyms
subSections.text:
* {{sense|draft}} {{ja-r|草案|そうあん}}
* {{sense|cursive}} {{ja-r|草書|そうしょ|pos=a document}}, {{ja-r|草仮名|そうがな|pos=phonetic ''[[man'yōgana]]'' characters written in cursive}}

subSections.title: Etymology 3
Noun
subSections.text:
{{ja-noun|くさ}}

# {{lb|ja|Internet slang}} "[[grass]]", in reference to the expression {{m|ja|w|t=[[LOL]]}}; [[LOL]]s
